value: Hippity-hoppity...$k$pEr, were you watching?

Right now, I'm dressed up like my
younger sister was...$k$pI'd love to see all three of us together
in rabbit costumes, if we get the
chance.

I think that dressing as a rabbit would
suit you. Shall I pull an outfit together
for you?

These ears are fine, aren't they?
Do you want to touch them?

Rabbits may be cute, but I am a
pegasus knight. I won't forget my
purpose—you can count on it.

Hello! I come carrying spring wishes
from $Nf.

I feel great! Setting a good example
for my sisters means a lot to me.
I'll jump even higher!
Perhaps I've become timid.

What a cheery feeling! Spring has
truly come.

I am Palla, of the Macedonian
Whitewings. I am pleased to
greet you dressed as a rabbit.

A warm breeze fills the air...the
breath of spring over the hills and
fields. Winter has ended.$k$pWinter's chill snatches away warmth
from the people and life and color
from the land.$k$pNo matter how harsh the winter,
everyone can always look forward
to spring and support each other.$k$pSpring is their reward for overcoming
the winter. They can laugh, sing,
dance, and celebrate as one.$k$pSo let's join them—together. Two
happy spring rabbits!
やっ！
いきます！
きゃああっ！
だめっ…！
Spring at last!
Spring is here!
Hope springs eternal!
This rabbit bites!
From spring...to fall...
Umm...
I am Palla of the Whitewings. I admit, I'm unaccustomed to this season's...unusual...attire.
Hmmm... These ears never stay on straight, do they?
I hear my sister Catria braved this attire as well.
This spring weather is so warm and gentle…I'm getting sleepy.
You like my spring outfit? Really? Well...thank you for saying so.
Hip-pity hop-ping into spring... Oh! Haha! Spring has put me in a silly mood, as you can see!
I find that cute bunnies can be comforting during difficult times.
No doubt.
Tell me your plan.
Sunshine…
